overview: Here's a sex-spiced "who-dun-it" thriller from Hollywood's hardcore underground. It seems that a beautiful showgirl named Melanie found her roommate strangled with a pair of black stockings. With the help of a "down-on-his-luck" detective, she sets out to track down the killer and uncovers a tangled web of sexual intrigue that borders on the insatiable. You have been warned!
tagline: Ashlynn Gere Loves Removing Her Black Stockings. . . Wanna Watch?
title: Black Stockings
